tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CustomerChurnRates (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(50),
  churn_date DATE,
  churn_reason TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE purchases (
  purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  purchase_date DATE,
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE churn_rates (
  churn_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  churn_date DATE,
  reason VARCHAR(255),
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
  customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  phone VARCHAR(20),
  signup_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
  interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id UUID,
  interaction_date DATE,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  interaction_details TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE churn_rates (
  churn_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id UUID,
  churn_date DATE,
  churn_reason TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Customer ( 
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  customer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
  customer_email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
  join_date DATE NOT NULL, 
  loyalty_points INT NOT NULL, 
  churned BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE PurchaseHistory ( 
  purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  customer_id INT NOT NULL, 
  purchase_date DATE NOT NULL, 
  total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL, 
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customer(customer_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE ChurnPrediction ( 
  prediction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  customer_id INT NOT NULL, 
  prediction_date DATE NOT NULL, 
  churn_probability DECIMAL(5, 2) NOT NULL, 
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customer(customer_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE RetentionAction ( 
  action_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  customer_id INT NOT NULL, 
  action_date DATE NOT NULL, 
  action_description TEXT NOT NULL, 
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customer(customer_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);
